subject: Trouble connecting my new headphones
body:
Hi Support,
I bought the SonicBoom Wireless Headphones last Tuesday, and I’m having a really hard time keeping them connected to my phone. They pair fine initially, but after about 10 minutes, the audio cuts out completely. I’ve tried resetting them and forgetting the device on my iPhone, but the issue persists. Can someone help me troubleshoot this? I need them for my commute.
Best regards,
Jason Miller

subject: Error code 404 during setup
body:
Hello,
I am trying to install the Vector Graphics Suite 2024 on my Windows 11 machine, but the installation keeps crashing at 85%. It gives me an "Error Code 404 - Missing Library" message. I have already checked my system specs and I definitely have enough RAM. Please let me know how to fix this so I can get back to work.
Thanks,
Sarah Jenkins

subject: Watch battery draining too fast
body:
To whom it may concern,
I’ve noticed that my Apex Smartwatch Gen 5 is barely lasting half a day on a full charge. The advertising said it should last 48 hours. I’m not even using the GPS features, just basic notifications. Is my unit defective or is there a setting I need to change?
Sincerely,
Amit Patel

subject: Coffee machine making strange noises
body:
Hi there,
My BaristaPro Espresso Maker started making a really loud grinding noise this morning when I tried to pull a shot. Water is coming out, but the pressure gauge isn’t moving. I’ve only had this machine for three months. Is this something I can fix myself or do I need a technician?
Elena Rodriguez

subject: Hub not finding devices
body:
Good morning,
I recently upgraded my router, and now my HomeGuard Security Hub refuses to reconnect to the Wi-Fi. I’ve held the reset button for 10 seconds as per the manual, but the light stays red. I can't view any of my cameras right now. Please assist.
Michael Chang

subject: Display issues on new laptop
body:
Hi Team,
I received my Titan Gaming Laptop X15 yesterday. While the performance is great, I’m noticing a distinct flicker on the bottom left of the screen when the brightness is set to high. It’s very distracting during gameplay. I’ve updated the drivers, but it hasn't helped.
Jessica Bloom

subject: Broken screen in shipment
body:
Hello,
I am extremely disappointed. I just opened the box for the UltraView 4K Monitor I ordered, and the screen is completely shattered. The shipping box looked crushed on one corner. I need a replacement sent out immediately or a full refund. I have attached photos of the damage.
David Thorne

subject: You sent the wrong color
body:
Hi,
I ordered the Velvet Armchair in Navy Blue (Order #9982), but what arrived today is clearly Forest Green. It clashes with my living room decor. I’d like to return this and get the correct color sent to me. Please send a return label.
Priya Singh

subject: Returning the vacuum
body:
Hi Customer Service,
I would like to request a refund for the Cyclone Stick Vacuum. I’ve used it twice, and honestly, the suction power is just not strong enough for my carpets. It’s not damaged, but it’s not working for my needs. How do I go about sending this back?
Tom Hansen

subject: Cancel and refund please
body:
Hello,
My son accidentally purchased the Galactic Raiders Game on my account without my permission. We have not downloaded or played it yet. Can you please reverse this transaction and refund the $59.99 to my card?
Thank you,
Linda Wei

subject: Boots falling apart
body:
Hi,
I bought a pair of TrailBlazer Hiking Boots three weeks ago. After just one hike, the sole is already peeling off the left boot. I expect much better quality for this price. I want my money back, I don't want an exchange.
Marcus Johnson

subject: Arrived too late
body:
To the support team,
I ordered the PartyBox Bluetooth Speaker for a birthday party happening last weekend. It just arrived today, which is three days late. I ended up buying one locally. I no longer need this item. Please process a refund.
Chloe Evans

subject: Charged twice for the same order
body:
Hi,
I was checking my credit card statement and noticed two pending charges of $49.99 for my subscription to MealPlan Plus. I only authorized one month. Please refund the duplicate charge immediately and confirm that my auto-renew is actually off.
Robert Downey

subject: Locked out of my account
body:
Hello,
I am trying to log in to manage my CloudDrive Storage settings, but it says my account is locked. I tried the "forgot password" link, but I never received the email. Can someone please help me regain access? I have important files I need to get to.
Fatima Al-Fayed

subject: Stop my subscription
body:
Hi,
Please cancel my subscription to FitLife Pro effective immediately. I am not using the app enough to justify the monthly cost. I want to make sure I am not charged for next month (December).
Greg Norman

subject: Need receipt for tax purposes
body:
Good afternoon,
Could you please send me a PDF invoice for the purchase of the ErgoOffice Desk Chair? I bought it last week, but I can't find the receipt in my email. I need it to submit an expense report to my company.
Samantha Lee

subject: Update shipping address
body:
Hi,
I just placed an order for the InstaPot Duo about an hour ago. I realized I accidentally used my old apartment address. Can you please update the shipping address to 123 Maple Street? I hope it hasn't shipped yet.
Kevin O'Connor

subject: Upgrading to the family plan
body:
Hello Team,
I currently have the individual plan for StreamMusic Unlimited. I want to upgrade to the Family Plan so my kids can use it too. How do I do this without losing my current playlists?
Angela Rossi

subject: Tracking says delivered but no package
body:
Hi,
I have a problem. The tracking number for my SilentNight Humidifier says it was delivered yesterday at 2:00 PM. I was home all day and nobody rang the doorbell, and there is nothing on my porch. Can you help me locate my order?
Peter Parker

subject: Missing items from my order
body:
Hello,
I received my package today. The Yoga Mat is inside, but the set of Resistance Bands that I ordered in the same transaction is missing. The packing slip lists both items. Are the bands coming in a separate box?
Lara Croft

subject: When will it ship?
body:
Hi,
I pre-ordered the NextGen Console two months ago. The website said it would ship by the 15th, but my status still says "Processing." Can you give me an update on when this is actually going to be sent out?
Bruce Wayne

subject: Will this work with my Mac?
body:
Hi,
I am looking at buying the External SSD 2TB you have on sale. The description mentions Windows, but doesn't explicitly say it works with macOS Monterey. Can you confirm if this is compatible before I buy it?
Steve Rogers

subject: Discount didn't apply
body:
Hello,
I just bought the Winter Down Jacket and tried to use the code WELCOME20. The system said the code was valid, but the final price on my receipt doesn't show the 20% discount. Can you adjust the price for me?
Natasha Romanoff

subject: Feature request for the app
body:
Hi Team,
I love using the TaskMaster Project Tool, but I really wish there was a dark mode for the mobile app. The white background is too bright when working late at night. Are there plans to add this?
Tony Stark

subject: Motor stopped working
body:
To Support,
My HydroClean Power Washer just died in the middle of washing my driveway. I bought it 11 months ago, so it should still be under the 1-year warranty. How do I initiate a warranty claim for a repair or replacement?
Thor Odinson

subject: I have two accounts
body:
Hi,
I realized I have two accounts for ReaderDigest Online, one under my personal email and one under my work email. Is it possible to merge them so all my saved articles are in one place?
Diana Prince

subject: Lost the remote
body:
Hello,
We moved recently and I seem to have lost the remote control for my VisionX 55" Smart TV. Do you sell replacement remotes separately? I can't find one on your website.
Clark Kent

subject: Unauthorized transaction
body:
Urgent,
I just got a notification that my card was used to buy a Gift Card on your site. I did not make this purchase! Please cancel this immediately and refund my card.
Wanda Maximoff

subject: adding installation to order
body:
Hi,
I ordered the HeavyDuty Washing Machine yesterday. I forgot to select the "Professional Installation" add-on. Is it too late to add that service to my order? I don't think I can install it myself.
Bucky Barnes

subject: Sparking plug
body:
URGENT:
I plugged in my HeatWave Space Heater for the first time and saw a visible spark at the wall outlet and smelled burning plastic. I unplugged it immediately. This seems dangerous. How do I return this safely?
Clint Barton

subject: Printer refuses to connect to network
body:
Hi Support,
I purchased the PrintMaster 5000 for our small office last week. We managed to get it working via USB, but the wireless feature is failing. It finds the network, asks for the password, and then just spins until it times out. We have a standard WPA2 setup. Can someone guide us through the network configuration? We need this wireless for our mobile devices.
Thanks,
Sarah Connor

subject: Question about bulk pricing
body:
Good morning,
I am looking to outfit our entire sales team with the Ergonomic Wrist Rest Pro. We would need about 50 units. I see the price on the website is $25 each, but do you offer a corporate discount for bulk orders? If so, could you please send over a quote?
Best regards,
Dwight Schrute

subject: Subscription auto-renewed by mistake
body:
Hello,
I just got an email saying my subscription to CloudSync Premium has been renewed for another year ($120). I meant to cancel this before the trial ended yesterday but forgot. I haven't uploaded any files since I signed up. Is it possible to cancel this now and get a refund on the renewal fee?
John Wick

subject: Wrong size received
body:
Hi,
I ordered the Vintage Denim Jacket in a size Medium. The package arrived today, and the tag on the jacket clearly says "Small." It’s way too tight. I’d like to exchange this for the Medium I originally ordered. Do I have to pay for return shipping if it was your mistake?
Marty McFly

subject: 2FA code not arriving
body:
To Security Support,
I am trying to log into my SecureVault Banking App on a new phone. It asks for a 2-factor authentication code via SMS, but I have been waiting for 20 minutes and haven't received anything. My phone number hasn't changed. Can we try verifying via email instead?
James Bond

subject: Incomplete shipment inquiry
body:
Hello,
I ordered the Bedroom makeover set (Order #4451). The bed frame arrived via freight yesterday, but the Memory Foam Mattress was not on the truck. The driver said he only had one box for me. When can I expect the mattress? I can't really use the bed without it.
Sleeping Beauty

subject: Data export feature request
body:
Hi,
I've been using FinanceTracker 360 for my personal accounting for two years. It's great, but I really need a way to export my data to a CSV or Excel file so I can share it with my accountant. Currently, I can only print PDFs. Is this feature on your roadmap?
Gordon Gekko

subject: Leaking product
body:
Hi,
I received my order for the GlowSkin Vitamin C Serum today. Unfortunately, the cap was loose and about half the bottle leaked out inside the bubble wrap. It’s a sticky mess. Can you send a replacement bottle? I can send photos of the packaging.
Daenerys Targaryen

subject: Game keeps crashing on load
body:
Support,
I bought Starship Commander on PC yesterday. Every time I try to load the second mission, the game freezes and crashes to the desktop without an error message. My drivers are up to date. Is there a patch coming for this? I can't progress in the game.
Luke Skywalker

subject: Need to expedite shipping
body:
Hi there,
I placed an order this morning for the Silk Evening Gown. I selected standard shipping, but I just found out I need it for an event this Friday. Is it possible to pay the difference to upgrade to Overnight or 2-Day shipping? Please let me know ASAP so it doesn't ship standard.
Rachel Green

subject: GDPR - Delete my account
body:
To the Privacy Officer,
I am writing to request the deletion of my account and all associated personal data from the SocialConnect platform, in accordance with GDPR regulations. Please confirm once my data has been permanently removed from your servers.
Hermione Granger

subject: Customization inquiry
body:
Hello,
I see you sell the Neon Bar Sign on your site. Do you do custom orders? I want one that says "Saul's Office" in yellow and blue. Let me know the lead time and pricing for custom work.
Saul Goodman

subject: Sync failed with Strava
body:
Hi,
My FitnessBand X is tracking my steps fine on the watch itself, but it stopped syncing with the Strava app on my phone about three days ago. I tried unlinking and relinking the accounts, but it says "Sync Error." Any ideas?
Steve Austin

subject: Allergy information needed
body:
Hi,
I want to buy the Nutty Granola Bars for my son's school trip, but the website description doesn't explicitly say if they are produced in a nut-free facility. He has a severe peanut allergy. Can you confirm if there is cross-contamination risk?
Charlie Bucket

subject: Update payment method
body:
Hello,
My credit card on file for the Monthly Wine Box subscription has expired. I tried to update it in the portal, but the 'Save' button is greyed out. I don't want to miss this month's shipment. Can someone help me update my card manually?
Tyrion Lannister

subject: Complaint about delivery driver
body:
To Customer Service,
I need to report an incident with the delivery of my GroceryFresh Order. The driver left the bags in the middle of the driveway in the rain, instead of on the covered porch. Half my paper bags soaked through and ripped. I expect a refund for the damaged items.
Karen Page

subject: Smart bulb won't pair
body:
Hi,
I bought a 4-pack of LumaHome Bulbs. Three of them paired with the app immediately, but the fourth one just blinks rapidly and won't connect no matter what I do. I think this specific bulb is a dud. How do I get a replacement for just the one bulb?
Thomas Edison

subject: Educational discount inquiry
body:
Hello,
I am a university student studying architecture. I want to buy the DesignPro Software license, but the full price is a bit out of my budget. Do you offer an educational discount for students with a valid .edu email address?
Miles Morales

subject: Merging loyalty points
body:
Hi,
I have two loyalty cards for the Morning Coffee Club because I forgot mine once and started a new one. Is there a way to combine the points from card #1234 and card #5678 onto a single account? I want to redeem my free drink.
Lorelai Gilmore

subject: Refund for cancelled event
body:
Hi,
I bought tickets for the Summer Rock Festival via your platform. The event organizers just announced it's cancelled due to weather. Will the refund for my tickets happen automatically, or do I need to file a claim form?
Jimi Hendrix

subject: Drone drifting to the left
body:
Support,
My SkyEye Drone has a serious calibration issue. Even in zero wind, it drifts hard to the left. I've done the compass calibration and the IMU reset twice. It makes it very hard to land safely. Is this a motor issue?
Maverick Mitchell

subject: Unknown fee on statement
body:
Hello,
I am looking at my bank statement and I see a charge of $4.99 from your company labeled "Service Fee." I never agreed to this. I only bought the product, I didn't sign up for any service. Please explain this charge or refund it immediately.
Scrooge McDuck

subject: Returning a gift
body:
Hi,
I received the TurboShaver 3000 as a gift for my birthday, but I already have one. I don't have the original receipt, just the gift receipt. Can I return this for store credit instead of a refund to the purchaser's card?
Harry Potter

subject: Stock availability check
body:
Hi,
I've been trying to find the AirJump Sneakers in the "Retro Red" colorway, size 11. Your website says "Out of Stock," but I was wondering if you have any inventory in your physical warehouse that isn't listed online? Or do you know when you will restock?
Michael Jordan

subject: Thermostat wiring help
body:
Hello,
I am trying to install the ThermoSmart V2. My wall has a wire labeled "K" but your manual doesn't mention where a K-wire goes. I don't want to short out my HVAC system. Can you send me a wiring diagram for a system with a K-wire?
Frodo Baggins

subject: Change email address
body:
Hi,
I need to update my profile. I am changing jobs and my account is currently linked to my work email (lois@dailyplanet.com). I need to change it to my personal email so I don't lose access to my purchase history.
Lois Lane

subject: Food quality issue
body:
To Whom It May Concern,
We ordered the Family Feast Meal Kit last night. The chicken included in the kit smelled awful and was clearly spoiled. We had to throw the whole dinner out and order pizza. I am extremely unhappy with the quality control. I want a full refund.
Gordon Ramsay

subject: App crashes on startup
body:
Hi,
Since the last update on iOS, the CryptoWallet App crashes immediately upon opening. I can't access my funds. I've tried reinstalling the app and restarting my phone, but nothing works. Please fix this bug ASAP.
Satoshi Nakamoto

subject: Missing screws for assembly
body:
Hi,
I am currently trying to put together the Nordic Bookshelf I bought. Step 3 requires 'Screw Type B', but the bag is completely empty. I can't finish building this without them. Can you ship a hardware pack to me?
Bob the Builder

subject: Where is my refund?
body:
Hello,
I returned the NoiseCancel Headphones two weeks ago. I got an email confirming you received the return on the 10th. It is now the 24th and I still haven't seen the credit appear on my Visa card. How long does this usually take?
Clark Griswold
